overview: Bob Hiss is the Senior Vice President of Professional Services and Product Development for ChoiceStream. Bob brings 26 years of professional experience to ChoiceStream having performed a broad range of roles including executive management, sales, marketing, support, programming and product management. Prior to ChoiceStream, Bob was founder and CEO of Get Back Software, LLC, maker of Postwareâ„¢ software, a product he architected and patented. Before Get Back, Bob served as president & CEO of MarketSoft Corporation. Prior to joining MarketSoft, Bob spent 17 years with Andersen Consulting. Bob has a BS in Industrial and Operational Engineering from the University of Michigan.

relationships.title: SVP, Professional Services and Product Development
